name: Leg Frogs
description:
If you liked this, try the free demo for my full-time game, Rocket Sword, where you wield the most powerful weapon in the universe.

A quick little game I made for a jam. You play as a frog. Beat your friends to be the best frog. Email me if you can beat the AI coz I need tips.

Now with gamepad support and various gameplay options.

https://github.com/uzkbwza/leg-frogs
